name: User
description: Representation of a human user of the system.

properties.name: User
properties.short: Representation of a human user of the system
properties.definition: Representation of a human user of the system.

properties.name: id
properties.definition: The logical id of the resource, as used in the URL for the resource. Once assigned, this value never changes.

properties.name: meta
properties.definition: The metadata about the resource. This is content that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

properties.name: implicitRules
properties.definition: A reference to a set of rules that were followed when the resource was constructed, and which must be understood when processing the content. Often, this is a reference to an implementation guide that defines the special rules along with other profiles etc.

properties.name: language
properties.definition: The base language in which the resource is written.

properties.name: firstName
properties.definition: The first name or given name of the user. This is the value as entered when the user is created. It is used to populate the profile resource.

properties.name: lastName
properties.definition: The last name or family name of the user. This is the value as entered when the user is created. It is used to populate the profile resource.

properties.name: email
properties.definition: The email address that uniquely identifies the user.

properties.name: emailVerified
properties.definition: Whether the system has verified that the user has access to the email address.

properties.name: passwordHash
properties.definition: Encrypted hash of the user's password.

properties.name: mfaSecret
properties.definition: Shared secret for MFA authenticator applications.

properties.name: mfaEnrolled
properties.definition: Whether the user has completed MFA enrollment.

properties.name: project
properties.definition: Optional project if the user only exists for the project. This is used for the project-specific user database.

searchParameters.name: email
searchParameters.description: The email address of the user

searchParameters.name: project
searchParameters.description: The project that contains the user
